content:
Get egg-static about $1.00 rooms!

 
Mark your calendar:
 
4th Annual 
Great Easter Rate Hunt
Sunday, April 1st
 
What is The Great Easter Rate Hunt? It's like an Easter egg hunt, but with super cheap hotel rates! Every year on Easter Sunday, we host an online competition where registered participants hunt our website for super discounted rates across a variety of rooms (yes, even Ocean Front rooms!), some at $1.00 and others at $99!
 
Register for the competition by signing up below with your email address and liking us on Facebook. You will soon receive an email with rules, tips for success and, on Easter Sunday, the official start time!
